title: Coca-Cola Company 's net operating revenues worldwide 2007 to 2019
summary: In general Revenues in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.

Revenues in billion U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2015, slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, and finally roughly increasing from 2018 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Revenues in billion U.S. dollars, of value 48.02 was reached at Year 2012
The lowest Revenues in billion U.S. dollars, of value 30.99 was reported at Year 2009
